attributes.comment:
Adoptive Parent-Jennifer K. McFatridge-I received word of a potential increase in
fees for USCIS. I'm writing to you to take exception to those of us who are waiting
for adoption. Even if you do need to assess fees, there should be a renewal type
option of a lesser amount for those of us who have already filed at the initial full
cost. This whole process is out of our control. With adoptions in China
approaching 18 months for referral, it is inevitable that we will have to re-file. All of
these fees add up and I simply think it is unfair to assess a full-cost fee to a
family that is simply waiting for their referral.

The other option would be to allow us to renew our initial filing. In today's adoption
world, 18 months just isn't long enough.

Thank you for reading my comments.

Have a great day.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jennifer McFatridge
